Text: truly amazing show but has anyone got this 1080p version with sean pertwee doing the narating please? i find he makes it sound a lot better almost scary sometimes lol. any help would be most grateful cheers.

this is also in english langugage ... if you are watching it with VLC player run the .mkv file and then just right click on the image and the menu will appear then click Audio -> Audio Track and there you will see it two options which one of them is for english langugage

Overall: nerd-p0rn, must watch.

install codecs, open with vlc etc... it might jitter if your computer is low spec
